Key Match Events: Paul George hyperextended his left knee in a preseason game against the Atlanta Hawks.
Pre-Game Insights: The Philadelphia 76ers have high expectations for the upcoming regular season after falling short in the playoffs throughout the Joel Embiid era.
Post-Match Reflections: It's unclear if Paul George will be able to suit up and make his Sixers regular season debut after leaving Monday night's game with an injury.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Philadelphia 76ers begin the 2024-25 season at home against the Milwaukee Bucks next Wednesday, Oct. 23 on national television.
Others: The Philadelphia 76ers signed veterans Andre Drummond, Eric Gordon, Caleb Martin Jr. and brought back Kelly Oubre Jr. and Kyle Lowry in free agency, among other moves.
